settings.html: Introducing the remarkable Barco Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530, a cutting-edge 5th generation 6MP fusion monitor specifically engineered for radiologists seeking the highest quality images in diagnostic radiology. As the latest and most advanced model in Barco's esteemed Coronis Fusion line, which debuted in 2009, the Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530 raises the bar once again for diagnostic displays in the medical industry. Radiologists can rely on the unparalleled performance and precision of the Coronis MDCC-6530, a pivotal model in Barco's General Radiology lineup, to assist in accurate diagnoses and enhance patient care. Experience the future of diagnostic imaging with the Barco Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530.

settings.title: Greyscale & Color DICOM Calibration with Barco's I-Guard Technology
settings.content: The Coronis MDCC-6530 display from Barco incorporates the essential I-Guard technology, which employs an integrated front-of-screen photometer for constant evaluation of image quality and preservation of exact DICOM calibration. With seamless integration with Barco's MediCal QAWeb service, I-Guard presents radiologists with a complete approach to quality assurance and simplified calibration administration. The smart monitoring features of I-Guard cater to the distinct demands of the radiology profession, establishing it as a vital instrument for professionals aiming to reinforce diagnostic reliability and maximize patient care quality.

settings.title: Uniform Luminance Technology
settings.content: The MDCC-6530, equipped with Barco's Uniform Luminance Technology (ULT), is specially crafted to tackle the difficulties encountered by radiologists. Conventional LCD displays tend to display uneven brightness in more than 25% of the screen area, leading to image disturbances and diminished quality. However, ULT technology overcomes these color and luminance disparities, guaranteeing total adherence to DICOM GSDF standards throughout the whole screen surface.

settings.title: Single View & Display Partitioner
settings.content: Barco's User-friendly Workflow Tools boast advanced features such as SingleView and Display Partitioner. SingleView allows you to connect your dual-input display and use it as a seamless desktop, eliminating any disruptions at the screen's center. This eliminates the necessity for an extra monitor, fostering a more flexible desktop where images can be positioned at the center without distortion risks. On the other hand, Display Partitioner enables you to split a single input source into two sections on your screen, which is especially useful for multitasking or comparing different images side by side. Both SingleView and Display Partitioner are designed to enhance your workflow and increase efficiency by providing superior control over your display.

settings.title: Unleashing Precision: The Power of 30-Bit Color in Medical Imaging
settings.content: The 30-bit color capability of Barco Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530 further escalates the potential for precision in medical imaging. This advanced feature means that the monitor can display 1.07 billion colors, an immense leap from the 16.7 million colors that a conventional 24-bit monitor can display. In practical terms, this leads to a much smoother transition between colors and grayscales, substantially reducing the banding effect that can occur in lower bit-depth displays. For grayscale images, this vast increase in gradations of gray results in significantly improved detail, enhancing the visibility of even the most subtle variations in the image. This level of precision can be crucial for radiologists as it provides them with more accurate information for diagnosis and treatment planning. On the other hand, for color images, the 30-bit color capability provides an incredibly rich and lifelike palette, allowing for superior detail and differentiation between similar color hues. This can be particularly important in pathology and ophthalmology, where color differentiation is essential. In summary, the 30-bit capability of MDCC-6530 provides a more comprehensive and precise view of medical images, enhancing the quality of both grayscale and color images and ultimately leading to a more accurate diagnosis.

settings.title: Color PPU Technology:
settings.content: Color PPU (Per Pixel Uniformity) is another technological advancement that significantly enhances the quality of images in Barco diagnostic monitors. Color PPU ensures uniform luminance across each individual pixel, preserving the integrity and consistency of colors and grayscales displayed on the monitor. In contrast to traditional monitors where the brightness and color might vary from one part of the screen to another, Barco Coronis 6MP monitors with Color PPU technology maintain uniformity across the entire display. This uniformity in luminance results in highly accurate and consistent images, which is vital for the detailed analysis and diagnosis in medical fields. In essence, the Color PPU uniform luminance technology brings about an improvement in the fidelity of the visual data, contributing to better diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: SpotView™
settings.content: SpotView temporarily boosts display brightness within a circular region of interest, facilitating the examination of intricate details. This functionality dynamically improves contrast and, if required, enlarges or inverts pixels within the SpotView area, offering an optimized visual experience for detecting subtle variations.

settings.title: Ambient Light Compensation (ALC)
settings.content: The Ambient Light Compensation (ALC) technology incorporated in Barco's Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530 ensures DICOM compliance in all lighting conditions by evaluating the display brightness relative to the ambient light around it. Working in tandem with MediCal QAWeb, it notifies users when ambient light exceeds a pre-established threshold. This guarantees top-notch image quality, enabling the discernment of crucial details in any work environment. Take advantage of consistent DICOM compliance and outstanding image quality in various settings by employing the ALC feature.

settings.title: DimView
settings.content: DimView smartly dims auxiliary displays used for patient worklists or dictation, minimizing peripheral light during readings and enabling your eyes to focus on the diagnostic screen. You can select which display(s) should dim automatically when the cursor is not positioned over them. Each display can be dimmed individually (DimView), or the dimming of all supplementary displays can be synchronized (DimView Link), offering a personalized experience adapted to your specific preferences.

settings.title: Ergonomic Versatility with MDCC-6530's Adaptable Stand
settings.content: The stand of Barco's Coronis Fusion 6530 is designed for superior usability, providing enhanced comfort and flexibility while using the monitor. It includes tilt, swivel, and height adjustments, allowing you to position the display at your preferred angle. Furthermore, the stand features a connector compartment cover to hide cables, maintaining a neat and orderly workspace. Enjoy improved comfort and user convenience with the versatile stand of the Barco MDCC-6530.

settings.title: MDCC-6530 & MXRT: Peerless Diagnostic Accuracy
settings.content: Elevate your viewing experience by combining the Coronis Fusion MDCC-6530 with a Barco MXRT graphics card. This potent duo offers exceptional image quality and performance, ensuring precise and efficient diagnostic capabilities for radiologists. The MXRT-5600, MXRT-6700, MXRT-7600, and MXRT-8700 graphics cards are specifically engineered to augment the abilities of the MDCC-6530, delivering seamless integration and the highest image quality in the medical imaging domain. Experience unmatched clarity and precision in your diagnostic process by opting for the Barco MDCC-6530 and MXRT graphics card package.

settings.title: Enhanced Clarity for Radiologists with Anti-Reflective Glass
settings.content: The Barco MDCC-6530 display comes with an optional anti-reflective coated protective glass, which greatly improves performance and visual acuity for radiologists. This cutting-edge glass technology diminishes glare and reflections, allowing medical professionals to examine images with extraordinary sharpness and precision. By minimizing visual disturbances, the anti-reflective coated protective glass allows radiologists to concentrate on crucial details, resulting in more accurate diagnoses and enhanced patient outcomes. Enjoy unmatched image clarity with the Barco MDCC-6530 and its state-of-the-art anti-reflective protective glass.

settings.title: Barco QAWeb Calibration & QA Software
settings.content: As with all Barco medical display systems, the MDCC-6530 comes equipped with the convenience of MediCal QAWeb, available as either a standalone local workstation installation or a cloud-based subscription technology for automated calibration and Quality Assurance. This ensures optimal display uptime without the requirement for human intervention.

settings.title: MDCC-6530: Light & Modern Design
settings.content: The MDCC-6530 is designed to optimize the workspace for radiologists. With dimensions of 714 x 524-624 x 240 mm (28.11 x 20.63-24.57 x 9.45 inches) when using the stand, it is leaner and lighter than its predecessor, the MDCC-6430. The MDCC-6530 weighs a mere 16.3 kg (35.94 lbs), a significant 20.5% reduction in weight compared to the previous model. These improvements result in a 2.3% decrease in width (decreases are not to screen size but to black frame around the glass), up to 0.6% decrease in height, and a 7.3% decrease in depth, along with an impressive 20.5% reduction in weight. Radiologists will appreciate these enhancements as they allow for easier maneuverability and a smaller overall footprint, ultimately providing a more efficient and comfortable workspace to focus on their crucial diagnostic tasks.

settings.title: SmartCursor: Effortless Cursor Movement Across Varied Displays
settings.content:
Are you frequently dealing with the irritating problem of cursor trapping on the borders of displays with different sizes? Barco's SmartCursor™ provides the perfect remedy to this issue. This handy feature eradicates cursor sticking on the edges of neighboring displays with diverse dimensions, guaranteeing seamless navigation.

To activate SmartCursor™, navigate to the Barco System Settings and choose the SmartCursor™ option. With this functionality enabled, experience fluid cursor movement across all your radiology workstation displays, streamlining workflow and reducing interruptions during crucial diagnostic activities.

settings.title: Application Appearance Manager (AAM)
settings.content: The Application Appearance Manager (AAM) addresses the problem of eye strain caused by high display luminance when using a diagnostic display for non-diagnostic applications like reading text documents or emails. AAM allows users to set particular application windows to a lower luminance or different color profile while preserving the full diagnostic luminance for applications that need it. This functionality improves visual comfort, reduces eye strain, and maintains the necessary brightness level for diagnostic use. AAM is adaptable to individual preferences, enhancing the diagnostic display's usability and flexibility.

settings.title: SoftGlow™ Wall Light & Task Light
settings.content:
Introducing the Barco Coronis MDCC-6530 SoftGlow Wall and Task Light, a revolutionary solution tailored to radiologists' comfort and efficiency needs. Elevate your radiology workstation with these innovative lighting features, designed to create a calm and soothing atmosphere. The SoftGlow Wall Light illuminates the wall behind your Barco Coronis MDCC-6530, creating a soft, ambient glow that reduces glare and reflections on the display. This improvement in the overall visual experience enables radiologists to view images with greater clarity and accuracy.

The SoftGlow Task Light, specifically designed with radiologists in mind, provides targeted illumination for your workspace. Offering the perfect balance of brightness and contrast, the adjustable task light ensures that radiologists can easily read documents, analyze patient data, and perform other essential tasks without compromising their visual comfort. By reducing eye strain and fatigue caused by the abrupt contrast between the bright monitor and dim surroundings, the SoftGlow Wall and Task Light on the Barco Coronis MDCC-6530 help radiologists maintain focus, boost diagnostic accuracy, and achieve peak performance throughout the day.

settings.title: Input/Output Ports
settings.content: The Barco Coronis MDCC-6530 is engineered to maximize efficiency and versatility, equipped with a diverse array of I/O ports to ensure smooth and flexible connectivity. With both DisplayPort and DVI interfaces, it assures compatibility with a wide variety of systems and devices, enhancing user experience by enabling easy integration into numerous setups. In addition to this, the MDCC-6530 features a built-in USB hub, further expanding its connectivity options for peripheral devices and augmenting its user-centric design. The MDCC-6530 display can be seamlessly paired with any graphics card or operating system. The model represents a significant improvement over its predecessor, the 6130, by consuming 31% less power and generating considerably less heat, thanks to the innovative LED backlight technology.
